advancements.cm_story.root.title: Welcome to ChinjufuMod
advancements.cm_story.root.description: I got a Key item of ChinjufuMod.
advancements.cm_story.get_stamp.title: The return of the Admiral
advancements.cm_story.get_stamp.descript: I got the Admiral Stamp back.
advancements.cm_story.weapon.get_firstai: I got a First Aid Kit.
advancements.cm_story.teatime.get_tea.de: I got a cup of tea.
advancements.cm_story.teatime.get_teasta: I got a Tea stand with Scone.
advancements.cm_story.taru.get_wineglass: I got an Glass with Wine.
advancements.cm_story.taru.get_shouyusus: I got a SUSHI with soy sauce.
advancements.cm_story.season.get_1_newye: I got a New Year Decoration.
advancements.cm_story.jpblock.get_sekkai: I got a Material of Japanese style blocks.
advancements.cm_story.jpblock.get_jpbloc: I got a Japanese style block.
advancements.cm_story.jpblock.get_jpgard: I got a Garden decoration block.
advancements.cm_story.crops.get_curry_ro: Let's cook a Curry and rice
advancements.cm_story.crops.get_curry.de: I got a Curry and rice.
gui.config.chinjufumod.title: ChinjufuMod Config
gui.config.blastblockbreak.tooltip: If set to [ON], ammo blast breaks the block. Default=ON
gui.config.antishadow: Erase the shadow of the sliding door
gui.config.antishadow.tooltip: If set to [ON], erase the shadow of the sliding door with light value 1. Default=ON
gui.config.bauxiteore.gene.tooltip: If set to [ON], it will generate Bauxite ore. Default=ON
gui.config.cherrybiome.gene.tooltip: If set to [ON], it will generate Cherrybiome. Default=ON
gui.config.acerbiome.gene.tooltip: If set to [ON], it will generate Acerbiome. Default=ON
gui.config.ginkgobiome.gene.tooltip: If set to [ON], it will generate Ginkgobiome. Default=ON
gui.config.chestnutsfall.tooltip: If set to [ON], Chestnuts fall from Autumn leaves. Default=ON
gui.config.usemakimono.tooltip: If set to [ON], you can use Scroll blocks. Default=ON
gui.config.lowsound.tooltip: If set to [ON], use a more low-processing sound on carrier-borne aircraft. Default=ON
tips.item_admiral_stamp: Item used as a material of craft.
tips.item_claykawara: Burn in a furnace, this turns into KAWARA.
tips.item_rensouhou_large: Shoot large ammunition and attack living things.
tips.item_rensouhou_medium: Shoot medium ammunition and attack living things.
tips.item_rensouhou_small: Shoot small ammunition and attack living things.
tips.item_kk: Consume a carrier-based aircraft fuel to fly. Attack monsters.
tips.item_gyorai: Right-click to throw it at the creature.
tips.item_destroyer: Increases the attack power of Small guns, Torpedoes and Anchors.
tips.item_cruiser: Increases the attack power of Medium guns and Torpedoes.
tips.item_battleship: Increases the attack power of Large guns.
tips.item_carrier: Increases the attack power of Aircraft.
tips.block_lettertray: Using a book and 10 EX points, you write a random enchantment book.
tips.block_zaisu: Right click to sit. Legless chair.
tips.block_window: Reverse by put it while sneaking. Right click [open / close].
tips.block_mzabuton: Right click to sit. Sitting cushion.
tips.block_kagamimochi: The offering to <TOSHIGAMI>. To pray for a good harvest. Dec.28-Jan.11
tips.block_shimenawa: New Year Decoration to welcome <TOSHIGAMI>. Tell <TOSHIGAMI> to clean the house. Dec.13-Jan.15
tips.block_kadomatsu: New Year Decoration to welcome <TOSHIGAMI>. To pray for longevity. Dec.13-Jan.15
tips.block_kotatsu: Heating equipment combining table and quilt.
tips.block_hinakazari: <HINAMATSURI> Decoration. Mar.3 is <HINAMATSURI> to pray for girls' healthy growth.
tips.wp_stage2: Change by right click while sneaking. 2 stage.
tips.wp_stage3: Change by right click while sneaking. 3 stage.
tips.wp_stage4: Change by right click while sneaking. 4 stage.
tips.block_ranma: It is used for daylighting, ventilation, decoration.
tips.block_futon: Open by sneaking right click. Sitting and Regeneration.
tips.block_kawara: Roofing material made by baking clay.
tips.block_namako: Walls made of KAWARA and SHIKKUI.
tips.block_noren: Cloth used for awnings and blindfolds.
tips.block_sudare: Window blind. Sneaking right click [open / close].
tips.block_ishitourou: Stone lantern. To light a fire with Flint and Steel. Right click [off].
tips.block_chouzubachi: Stone bowl. To put in water with Water Bucket.
tips.block_bin_koubo: It becomes yeast over time. After culture, destroy and collect.
tips.block_taru_hakkou: Barrel used for fermentation of alcohol and MISO etc.
tips.block_taru_kouji: Shelf for making rice-malt. Collect with an empty hand.
tips.block_taru_shubo: Barrel for making yeast mash. Take it with a Bowl.
tips.block_taru_moromi: Barrel for making MOROMI-mash. Take it with a Bowl.
tips.block_taru_jukusei: Barrel for making Aged SAKE. After fermentation, collect with bare hands.
tips.block_taru_ringoshu: Barrel for making Cider. After fermentation, collect with a wine bottle.
tips.block_taru_budoushu: Barrel for making Wine. After fermentation, collect with a wine bottle.
tips.block_taru_miso: Barrel for making MISO. Collect with an empty hand.
tips.block_taru_koucha: Trays for oxidizing tea leaves. Collect with an empty hand.
tips.block_bot_sakenama: Can drink this with a Drink Glass. Burn in a furnace, this turns into a SAKE.
tips.block_bot_sake: Can drink this with a Drink Glass.
tips.block_food_nabeaz_1: Can drink this with a YUNOMI.
tips.block_kit_board: Can be used as a craft table.
tips.block_kit_sink: If the lower second block is water, right click [on / off].
tips.block_kit_oven: Can be used for cooking and smelting.
tips.block_irori: Japanese fireplace. Heat the DONABE with charcoal fire.
tips.block_kit_kanki: Right click [on / off]. Sneaking right click [change type].
tips.block_cstove_bot: Wood stove upper can be used as Furnace.
tips.block_frypan: Can cook on [Furnace / Cooktop / Cooking stove].
tips.block_nabe: Can cook on [Furnace / Cooktop / Cooking stove / IRORI].
tips.block_kettle: Boil water on [Furnace / Cooktop / Cooking stove / IRORI / Stove].
tips.block_simpledish: Use it by right-clicking and put it while sneaking.
tips.block_food_karanabe: Put foods in the Crafting Table and heat it.
tips.block_food_nabegohan_1: Take it with a CHAWAN, a Plate or a Bowl.
tips.block_food_teapot_1: Can drink this with a Teacup.
tips.block_food_kyusu_1: Can drink this with a YUNOMI.
tips.item_nigari: It is used when making TOFU.
tips.item_sakekasu: Used for Sweet half SAKE or Fertilizer.
tips.item_koubo: It is used when fermenting things.
tips.item_komekouji: It is used when making SAKE and MISO.
tips.item_shubo: Fermenting in a barrel it becomes MOROMI.
tips.item_moromi: Crafting it becomes Pure SAKE and SAKE cake.
tips.item_kiji_bun: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a bun.
tips.item_kiji_burg: It cooks in a frying pan and it becomes a beef hamburg.
tips.item_kiji_scone: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a scone.
tips.item_kiji_senbei: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a SENBEI.
tips.item_match_cm: Right click on the block and it will burn.
tips.item_food_tonsui: A small bowl for saucepan cooking.
tips.item_clay_yunomi: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a YUNOMI.
tips.item_clay_kyusu: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a KYUSU.
tips.item_clay_teacup: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a Teacup.
tips.item_clay_teapot: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a Teapot.
tips.item_clay_sara: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a Plate.
tips.item_clay_chawan: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a CHAWAN.
tips.item_clay_nabe: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a DONABE.
tips.item_clay_tonsui: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a TONSUI.
tips.block_rice: Plant it on a Paddy or Farmland. Grow one stage more on a Paddy.
tips.block_seedsbox: If broken it, you can get new seeds at random. All 16 types.
tips.block_wood_chanoki_nae: Plant it in a bright dirt, it will grow into a tree.
tips.block_wood_grape_nae: Plant it in a bright dirt, it will grow into a tree.
tips.block_bin_nyusan: Become lactobacillales over time. After culture, destroy and collect.
tips.item_nyusan: It is used when making cheese and chocolate.
tips.item_rennet: It is used when making cheese.
tips.block_cheesecurd: Make a Fresh cheese in craft. Become cheese over time.
tips.block_pizza_cheese: After placement, right click to break into pieces.
tips.block_kit_cheese_tana: The aging of the placed curd proceeds.
tips.block_fall_leaf: By using a shovel, it will be grass path. By using a hoe, it will be paddy.
tips.block_zundou_aku: By boiling a Grass Roof Block, get a Yarn.
tips.item_ykt: Ordinary dress to wear on the bare skin.
tips.block_wataame: Take away the packaging and become Cotton Candy.
tips.block_tabakusa_roof: Directional roof materials. Sneaking right click [change type].
tips.block_andon: Floor lamp. To light a fire with Flint and Steel. Right click [off].
tips.block_kanyou: Type changes when you put it while sneaking.
tips.block_gate: Reverse by put it while sneaking. Redstone [open / close].
tips.block_taru_cocoa: Barrel to ferment cacao beans. Take it with a Bowl.
tips.item_cocoa_ferm: Smelting it becomes a roasted cacao.
tips.item_cocoa_mass: When sugar and milk are added, it becomes pre-molding chocolate.
tips.item_shield: Right click to defend. Repairable with an iron ingot.
tips.item_shield2: When the player stops blocking, it will bounce off living things.
tips.block_shouji: Sliding door and Partition. Reverse by put it while sneaking. Right click [open / close].
tips.block_garasudo: Sliding door. Reverse by put it while sneaking. Right click [open / close].
tips.block_fusuma: Sliding door and Partition. Reverse by put it while sneaking. Right click [open / close].
item.chinjufumod.block_food_frypan_n_egg: Frying pan with raw egg hamburg
item.chinjufumod.block_food_frypan_n_kat: Frying pan with raw pork cutlet
item.chinjufumod.block_food_frypan_n_kin: Frying pan with raw mushrooms sauce
item.chinjufumod.block_food_frypan_n_tom: Frying pan with raw tomato sauce
tips.block_taru_hakusai_f: A barrel for making Chinese cabbage salted. When the water comes out, break it and collect it.
tips.block_taru_hakusai_f2: A barrel for making Chinese cabbage salted. Take it with a plate. 4 times.
tips.block_taru_komezu: Barrel for making rice vinegar. Take it with a Glass Bottle. 4 times.
tips.block_taru_shouyu: Barrel for making soy sauce. Take it with a Glass Bottle. 4 times.
tips.item_food_kirimi: Take it and right click on SUSHI rice to make a SUSHI.
tips.block_food_sushigeta_kara: Wooden plate for SUSHI. Pour soy sauce and put a SUSHI.
tips.block_niboshi_boiled: Collect in a glass bottle after drying.
tips.block_food_dashinabe_1: Take it in a DONBURI with Soy sauce.
tips.item_clay_donburi: Burn in a furnace, this turns into a DONBURI.
tips.item_food_donburi: Bowl for UDON and Rice, Ramen.
tips.block_wood_mikan: Plant it in a warm and bright dirt, it will grow into a tree.
tips.block_kit2_tana: Can hold wine, cider and sake.
tips.block_shishiodoshi: Reverse by put it while sneaking. Right click [start / stop].
tips.block_hodagi_a_bot: Mushrooms grow when placed in a place with a light level of 11 or less.
tips.block_taru_kinoko: Shelf for making DASHI with mushrooms. Collect in a glass bottle.
tips.block_taru_konbu: Shelf for making DASHI with kelp. Collect in a glass bottle.
tips.block_measurecup: A cup to draw water for cooking.
tips.block_suiden: Plant rice here. If water is not nearby, it turns to dirt.
tips.block_noriami: Place on a water and grow seaweed.
tips.block_taru_nori: A shelf for making NORI Sheets from raw seaweeds.
item.chinjufumod.block_food_frypan_n_kin: Mushrooms in soy sauce and sugar
item.chinjufumod.item_food_frypan_b_kino: Mushrooms cooked in soy sauce and sugar
tips.block_shoujihalf: Reverse by put it while sneaking. Right click [open / close].
tips.block_tobukuro: Wooden storm door box. Reverse by put it while sneaking. Right click [open / close].
tips.block_takeakari: To light a fire with Flint and Steel. Right click [off].
tips.item_kushi_sakana: Put it on the IRORI and cook it.
tips.block_taru_hachimitsushu: Barrel for making Mead. After fermentation, collect with a wine bottle.
tips.block_inagi: Hang 8 rice plants. After drying, right-click to collect the rice plants.
tips.block_mizuoke: A wooden bucket to get water or milk.
tips.block_mizuoke_full: Wooden Water Bucket that can turn a Sand into a Salt pond.
tips.block_wadaiko: Musical instrument to play with a stick. Sneaking right click [change type].
tips.item_hake: Craft a colored brush with a dye.
tips.item_kumade: Draw a pattern on Sand and Gravel.
tips.item_chisel: Turn the stone and the granite into the Garden stone.
tips.block_sama: Stack the same blocks to make it thicker.
tips.block_makibishi: Those who step on this will take damage.
tips.item_shouhou_empty: Record 100 EX points with 'Brush and Inkstone' or 'Federkiel set'.
tips.item_shouhou: Use this to get 100 EX points.
tips.item_toami: If you throw this at a fish, you can catch the fish.
tips.block_ami_shikake: If you put it in the ocean or river, you can catch fish.
tips.block_ami_youshoku: Increase the number of cods, salmon and tropical fish released in the net.
tips.repair_ami: You can repair it by using a string and 3 EX points.
tips.item_squid_raw: It can be divided into 2 ink sacs and a squid body.
tips.block_snowcore: Roll it on the snow to make it bigger. Stack two of them to make a Snowman.
tips.block_snowman: It changes by using a Carrot and Wool.
text.chinjufumod.rightclick.waterlogged: It cannot be used because it is flooded.
text.chinjufumod.rightclick.notenough_ex: You don't have enough EX points.
text.chinjufumod.rightclick.nothave: You don't have any usable items in your hand.
text.chinjufumod.rightclick.notenough_it: You don't have enough number of items.
text.chinjufumod.rightclick.noplace: There is no place to put it.
text.chinjufumod.rightclick.fullitem: Your hand is full of items.
text.chinjufumod.rightclick.blocked: The surface to be used is blocked.
tips.block_takenoko: You can roast it and eat it.
tips.block_takenoko2: When you plant it, it becomes bamboo.
tips.block_chestnuts: It can be divided into 2 fruits and a shell.
tips.item_chestnut: You can roast it and eat it.
item.chinjufumod.block_food_nabegohantak: DONABE with raw rice and bamboo shoots
DONABE with cooked rice and bamboo shoots
item.chinjufumod.block_food_gohantake_1: CHAWAN with cooked rice and bamboo shoots
tips.block_food_nabegohantake_1: Take it with a CHAWAN or a Bowl.
item.chinjufumod.block_food_nabegohankur: DONABE with raw rice and chestnuts
DONABE with cooked rice and chestnuts
item.chinjufumod.block_food_gohankuri_1: CHAWAN with cooked rice and chestnuts
tips.item_kaihori: On the Beach, collect Clams from the sand near the water.
item.chinjufumod.block_food_frypan_n_sea: Frying pan with raw seafood sauce
tips.item_ammunition_kijyuu: Can only be used on machine guns.
tips.item_3rensou_kijyuu: Shoot ammunition machine gun and attack living things.
tips.item_3rensou_kijyuu2: Click and hold to shoot continuously.
tips.item_kit_firstaid: If you hold it in your off-hand or main-hand, you can avoid death once.
tips.item_seeds_pepper: Plant it in a warm and bright dirt, it will grow into a tree.
tips.item_seeds_cumin: Plant it in a cool and bright farmland, it will grow.
tips.item_seeds_turmeric: Plant it in a warm and bright farmland, it will grow.
text.chinjufumod.too_cold: It cannot be planted in cold biomes.
text.chinjufumod.too_hot: It cannot be planted in hot biomes.
item.chinjufumod.block_food_frypan_n_rou: Frying pan with raw curry roux
tips.block_food_cunabe_1: Take it with a Plate with cooked rice.
item.chinjufumod.block_food_curryset_1: Beef curry and rice set menu
item.chinjufumod.block_food_curryset_c1: Chicken curry and rice set menu
item.chinjufumod.block_food_curryset_t1: Tomato curry and rice set menu
item.chinjufumod.block_food_frypan_n_osa: Frying pan with Raw OKONOMIYAKI sauce
tips.block_food_frypan_osauce: Collect in a glass bottle after cooking.
tips.item_food_tare: Right click on Chicken Bone Broth.
item.chinjufumod.block_food_teppan_n_oko: Raw OKONOMIYAKI with pork and noodles
Raw OKONOMIYAKI with squid and noodles
Raw OKONOMIYAKI with cheese and noodles
